Review Name: Nice product Review Description: I have received on 2nd May,19. Dot time Delivery. Delivery man's behaviour was good. As per my schedule the installation was done on 4th May,19. A man came & installed it . He charged me rs.700 for installation & extra rs.300 for fitting outdoor bracket. Bcz, the outdoor bracket, I have purchased from outside & he was really gentleman.Total experience was too good. Rest time will say. Thanks Flipkart.
